text: Sorede ware wa, kare-ra o sorezore no tsumi ni terashite 懲Ji meta. Arumononiha saseki no bōfū o okuri, mata arumononiha hitokoe (chōbatsu) de osoikakari, mata aru mono wa daichi ni shizume, mata aru mono o obore saseta. Kore wa arrā ga kare-ra o sokonatta node wanai. Kare-ra ga, jibun o sokonatta nodearu
